item.title: Quickly create your R project directory tree with pre-filled common files
item.description: Each time you start a new R project, it is highly recommanded to prepare a clean and organized working directory If you regularly create new projects, this working directory preparation task might seem tedious and time consuming. Creating the folders, intializing git, creating a license file, a readme file, etc. Instead of copying/pasting an existing pristine directory tree, I propose you to use the power of linux bash scripting. Iâ€™ve built a little script, inspired from frdvnw, that will allow you to quickly create a new R project directory tree along with all its commonly required files.
